list.curi_edu_goal_nm:
This course is an introduction to financial accounting and will teach you principles and applications of accounting logic. The content of the income statement, balance sheet, and statement of cash flows are studied in detail and analyzed. The knowledge and skills you will develop in this class will be useful for all business disciplines. Whether your future career goals relate to Finance, Marketing, Management or any other area, Accounting will play a very important role in your professional life. A good understanding of Accounting is essential for effective business decision making, and hence is a required course in every business school. Specifically, the course has the following objectives:
- To help understand the role and relationship of financial statements - To help understand financial transactions and their impact on financial statements - To develop an understanding of the accounting process and to summarize and communicate information useful in making economic decisions.
list.lec_goal_descr: 이 교과목은 기업의 외부 및 내부에 있는 경영자, 채권자, 주주 등 여러 이해관계자들의 의사결정에 유용한 정보를 제공하기 위해 경제적 거래를 인식 및 측정하고, 재무제표의 형태로 회계정보를 발행하는 과정을 이해하는 것을 목적으로 한다. 구체적으로 재무제표의 구성요소별로 기본적인 회계처리에 대한 내용을 다루고 더불어 기초적인 재무제표 분석에 대해서도 논의한다.
list.shbk_descr: Financial Accounting IFRS Edition 3rd ISBN 978-1-118-97808-5 Weygandt, Kimmel, Kieso
